definition: a remote ancestor
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to distance oneself from (classical)
ancestor/forefather/grandparents
surname Zu

sentences.english: Our distant forbears would not have understood such an interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 我們的遠祖也許就沒有過這樣的解釋。

sentences.english: The motifs are classic Chinese ones that are variations on themes that go all the way back to Zhou dynasty bronzes .
sentences.chinese: 圖案是典型的中國式，以周朝青銅器上的圖案爲遠祖。

sentences.english: Understand that I've played videogames my entire life starting with Atari & Nintendo right up till just a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，我從雅達利和任天堂遠祖時代玩到幾個月前。
